product_name: Von Zipper MindGlo Fulton Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Von Zipper MindGlo Fulton Sunglasses feature orange-accented frames for next-generation style. Meteor Glo coated lenses are ideal for bright sun conditions. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Orange frames feature gray-tinted lenses for neutral, true color perception in bright conditions. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are impact resistant. Rubber nosepads and temples keep sunglasses in place during high-intensity activity. The Von Zipper MindGlo Fulton Sunglasses feature rugged stainless-steel hinges that boost durability.
short_description: The Von Zipper MindGlo Fulton Sunglasses feature orange-accented frames for next-generation style. Meteor Glo coated lenses are ideal for bright sun conditions.
